name: Combat Skills 2
description:
Description:

Combat Skills is a little game about choosing certain "skills" to fight with, and trying to win. There are eight available skills, each with their strengths and weaknesses. Go against an AI, fight a friend, or team up with them in a 2v2. You decide.

Controls:

  • P1 (Red): W to move forward, A and D to turn, E to attack. 
  • P2 (Blue): I to move forward, J and L to turn, U to attack.
